name: Beggars Can Be Choosers (biancaramos98)
description:
This game was my team's final project in which we were tasked to create a "serious" game; a game with an objective that is other than to entertain (in our case, to educate). So, we created a game where you play as an adorable corgi and have to determine which foods are safe for dogs and which are not.

Team Members:

Bianca Ramos, Maya Hiatt, Louis Whitworth, Doyeon Kim and Ivan Aguirre
